alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 21 at 8:21PM MDT until May 22 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...the Northern Sangre De Cristo above 11000 feet, the Wet Mountains, the Wet Mountain Valley and Fremont and Huerfano counties. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on poor visibility and slick and slushy road conditions at times under the heavier snow bands.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
